page.title: 17RECREATION / HOBBIES
page.content: In Wigan we have lots of different types of recreation for young people. If you like sport there is plenty of variety - at Robin Park there are {football}and{rugby}pitches and an {athletics}track. In an old converted mill there is a{roller rink}and at the Three Sisters reclamation site{go-kart and{BMX}tracks. Swimmers can visit the large{International Pool. There are{discos}like Maxim's and the Pier for teenagers, or we can go to various{cafes}or{amusement arcades. ************************************** From a survey of 100 teenagers 44% said that their{main hobby}was SPORT, 36% favoured DISCOS, 24% liked READING 20% listened to POP MUSIC, 12% ROLLER SKATING, COMPUTING and COLLECTING, 8% BUILDING MODELS, WATCHING TV and DRAWING, 4% TRAIN SPOTTING, WALKING and SHOPPING.
